alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 9:15PM MST until December 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches on the valley floors, and 3 to 5 inches on the benches. * WHERE...Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Periodic road snow and slush will create slick roads, especially late Friday night through Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
